content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what was the main point of disagreement?
name: Evaluator

content: The main point of disagreement was the rental price. The landlord was looking for a higher price, while I, as the potential tenant, thought 650 Euros per month was a fair price for the apartment considering its location and facilities.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator
